website_summaries.verdict: This quality infuser stands out for being easy to use for travel mugs, but users also report it can be used in other mugs as well.
pros: Tea lovers report that this travel tea infuser makes it easy to customize how your tea is brewed and is simple to take apart and clean
We love that it can easily stand up to daily use
cons: Some users felt that the design was a bit too large for a travel mug, and not all felt it was easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Good for infusing with two small caveats
customer_reviews.text: Works great with a. Fits snug inside and doesn't move once inserted. My minor complaints about the tea infuser are the following: 1) Once your liquid level is below the tea infuser (i.e. after a few sips of liquid) then your no longer infusing. I would suggest infusing for a while before you drink, or else you may be disappointed. 2) The infuser while metal is suspect to denting. I accidentally dented the metal part when trying to separate the plastic and metal pieces. Word of advice try not to apply a lot of pressure on this directly, put more of a torque-like motion to get the two pieces apart and together.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for steeping tea in my contigo mug
customer_reviews.text: Great for steeping tea in my contigo mug. The one issue I had is I have a 20 oz mug and don't always want to put that much water in there when I brew tea. My solution to this problem is when I brew a smaller batch of tea to flip my mug upside down so the container is fully submirgered. Easy to attach and detach from the mug.

customer_reviews.title: Goes great with the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Great for loose leaf tea junkie
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I am a tea junkie. I prefer to drink loose leaf tea. At work it's hard to drink loose leaf tea and I thought this would be perfect. I purchased this along with a 20oz Contigo thermos. Most of the time tea infusers balls spill out tea particles into the drink or the bottom of the cup. This filter keeps everything in the filter and not in your drink. It is wonderful for the winter time easy to clean and has an awesome cup to keep the liquid inside after you remove the filter. So happy to have purchased this for myself for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.AG

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I received this product a couple days ago and have used it 4 times. It really makes a wonderful cup of tea in my Contigo Travel Mug. Not a huge deal, it is easy enough to take out, just slightly disappointing. This is why I only gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Larson

customer_reviews.title: I love tea in every shape and form
customer_reviews.text: I love tea in every shape and form. When I learned that Contigo (the only travel mug I will get) made a tea infuser that I can use with my travel mug, I had to get it. I never regretted my purchase! It screws in with my travel mug cover without problems. I put loose tea and bagged tea in my infuser. With a screw in top and a case to fit into, it never makes a mess. It is easy to clear - just dump out the tea and wash in the sink. Finally, the price is reasonable. If you are tea lover like me, you will love this product!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to my Contigo!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly! Once I got used to it, it wasn't a problem. The holes are very small, so I rarely see any particles that have escaped into the mug. Really easy to wash and also to attach to the mug lid.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended with the Contigo Autoseal West Loop Stainless Steel Travel ...
